name: @digitize/mysql-await
description: A wrapper over [mysqljs/mysql](https://github.com/mysqljs/mysql) module that mimics the same API as the original one but takes advantage of promises.

scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && tsc && cp ./package*.json ./dist/ && cp ./README.md ./dist/ && cp ./LICENSE ./dist/ && cp ./tsconfig.json ./dist/
